column4: If I want to make torrents with .iso files (like Ubuntu), what is the best place to do it?
what do you mean? =)
What is a good place to upload ISO torrents?
that depends what you want to do. Most trackers already have ubuntu ISOs I think =)
I'm planning on uploading other distributions as well..
well, most distributions have their own torrents as well.. look for them at distro's homepage. What browser do you use? =)
I use Firefox, I'm trying in Opera.
okay
let me know of your success with the torrents =)
Opera is freezing atm.. :P
Now I see colors again.. xD
Now I just have to wait and see! ;)
let me know if you upload anything.. I would love to share =)
I will! That's kind of you ! :)
I'm planning on uploading lesser known Linux distros too.. They are usually not available on large BitTorrent trackes like TPB
I got an error in Opera too.. :(
aw =(
Is there an easier and more stable way of uploading? Can I use an FTP app or something? :P
don't know of any
PM?
PM = personal message
I know, but how do I send a PM in XChat?
I sent one to you, just click it in the left list
